mapper.select: select g.id, g.insideCode, g.guaranteeSum, ddgs.statName as guaranteeStat, ddgw.guaranteeWayName as guaranteeWay, ddf.corporateName as finance, occurpyTime from zh_guarantee g LEFT JOIN zh_dd_guaranteestat ddgs on g.guaranteeStat = ddgs.statCode LEFT JOIN zh_dd_guaranteeway ddgw on g.guaranteeWay = ddgw.guaranteeWayCode LEFT JOIN zh_dd_financeorg ddf on g.financeCode = ddf.financeCode where g.insideCode = #{insideCode}
